ADLXWrapper
Table of Contents

Namespace ADLXWrapper

Classes

ADLX
ADLX3DSettingsServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLX3DSettingsServices selecting the highest available interface and exposing change handling.

ADLXApiHelper

Main ADLX API wrapper providing safe access to AMD ADLX Library Implements IDisposable for proper resource cleanup

ADLXDesktop

Flattened desktop façade with identity metadata and display enumeration helpers.

ADLXDesktopServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLXDesktopServices providing managed/native accessors and Eyefinity helpers.

ADLXDisplay

Flattened display façade with identity metadata, support-guarded feature accessors, and native list exposure.

ADLXDisplayServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLXDisplayServices that provides cached accessors and managed/native enumeration helpers.

ADLXException

Exception thrown when an ADLX API call fails

ADLXGPU

Flattened GPU façade with identity metadata and topology listeners.

ADLXGPUTuningServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLXGPUTuningServices selecting the highest available interface and exposing change handling helpers.

ADLXHardwareDetection

Hardware detection utilities for AMD GPU presence.

ADLXListHelpers

Helper methods for ADLX list operations.

ADLXMultimediaServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLXMultimediaServices exposing managed/native accessors and change handling.

ADLXPerformanceMonitoringServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLXPerformanceMonitoringServices providing managed/native accessors.

ADLXPowerTuningServicesHelper

Wrapper over IADLXPowerTuningServices selecting the highest available interface (if extended) and exposing change handling.

ADLXSystemServicesHelper

Helper wrapper over IADLXSystem exposing per-feature service accessors and GPU enumeration.

ADLXUtils
DesktopListListenerHandle
Display3DLutListenerHandle
DisplayGammaListenerHandle
DisplayGamutListenerHandle
DisplayListListenerHandle

Safe handle for an unmanaged IADLXDisplayListChangedListener backed by a managed delegate.

DisplaySettingsListenerHandle

Safe handle for an unmanaged IADLXDisplaySettingsChangedListener backed by a managed delegate.

GpuTuningListenerHandle

Safe handle for an unmanaged IADLXGPUTuningChangedListener backed by a managed delegate.

MultimediaListenerHandle
PowerTuningListenerHandle

Safe handle for an unmanaged IADLXPowerTuningChangedListener backed by a managed delegate. Callbacks arrive on ADLX threads; the handle roots the delegate until disposed or explicitly removed.

ThreeDSettingsListenerHandle

Safe handle for an unmanaged IADLX3DSettingsChangedListener backed by a managed delegate. Callbacks arrive on ADLX threads; the handle roots the delegate until disposed or explicitly removed.
